#summary Details on getAuthorizedCloseItemReasons() API function
#sidebar ApiFunctions

Call this function to get the list of authorized reasonsto close an item. You have to set such a reason when calling ([closeItem](). 


=== Call ===

 * syntax : getAuthorizedCloseItemReasons()

=== Response ===

 * response : _array_ : the immediate response is always an array of 2 elements
  * element 1 : _boolean_ : true (if call ok) or false (if call not ok)
  * element 2 : 
   * if call ok : _array_ : list of authorized reasons to close an item
   * if call not ok : _string_ : error message

 * notification : none

=== Code example (PHP) ===
{{{
//FUNCTION CALL
$objSoapClient = new SoapClient('http://api.delcampe.net/soap.php?wsdl');
list($success, $token) = $objSoapClient->authenticateUser('MyPersonalApiKey');

if (true === $success) {
  $return = $objSoapClient->getAuthorizedCloseItemReasons();
}
}}}
